channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Arvin Das

item.title: lack of coincidences, a medium, and stock-to-flow
item.description: I’ve hopped on a mission to understand crypto. This is a documentation of some of the things I’ve learnt so far from Nikolai’s Bitcoin series on YouTube and The Bitcoin Standard by Prof Saifedean Ammous. Disclaimer: to understand how Bitcoin works, one must first understand the how, why, and what of money. This blog has no mention of crypto. Just letting you know. Let’s get started. The concept of money goes way back, all the way to 6000 BC.
